# Wireframe Standards Guide

## Wireframe Fidelity Levels

### Low-Fidelity (Lo-Fi)

**Purpose**: Quick ideation, exploring layouts
**Tools**: Paper, whiteboard, basic shapes
**Time**: Minutes per screen

```

```

**Characteristics**:

- No color (grayscale)
- No real content
- Rough proportions
- Focus on layout

### Medium-Fidelity (Mid-Fi)

**Purpose**: Validate structure, stakeholder review
**Tools**: Figma, Sketch, Balsamiq
**Time**: Hours per screen


**Characteristics**:

- Grayscale or limited color
- Placeholder images
- Realistic content hierarchy
- Accurate spacing

### High-Fidelity (Hi-Fi)

**Purpose**: Final design, development handoff
**Tools**: Figma, Sketch with design system
**Time**: Days per screen

- Full color and branding
- Real or realistic content
- Pixel-perfect spacing
- Interactive prototypes

---

### Interaction Annotations

| Annotation | Symbol | Meaning               |
| ---------- | ------ | --------------------- |
| Click/Tap  | â—      | Triggers action       |
| Hover      | â—      | State change on hover |
| Link       | â†’      | Navigates to page     |
| Modal      | âŠ      | Opens overlay         |
| Expand     | â–¼      | Shows more content    |
| Swipe      | â†”      | Gesture interaction   |
| Scroll     | â†•      | Scrollable area       |

---

## Spacing & Grid System

### 8px Grid

All spacing should be multiples of 8px:

| Token | Value | Usage            |
| ----- | ----- | ---------------- |
| `xs`  | 4px   | Tight, icons     |
| `sm`  | 8px   | Related elements |
| `md`  | 16px  | Default spacing  |
| `lg`  | 24px  | Section padding  |
| `xl`  | 32px  | Major sections   |
| `2xl` | 48px  | Hero sections    |
| `3xl` | 64px  | Page margins     |

### Column Grid

```

Desktop: 12 columns, 24px gutters, 80px margins
Tablet: 8 columns, 20px gutters, 40px margins
Mobile: 4 columns, 16px gutters, 16px margins
```

---

## Responsive Breakpoints

| Name     | Width  | Columns | Target                     |
| -------- | ------ | ------- | -------------------------- |
| Mobile S | 320px  | 4       | Small phones               |
| Mobile M | 375px  | 4       | Standard phones            |
| Mobile L | 425px  | 4       | Large phones               |
| Tablet   | 768px  | 8       | Tablets portrait           |
| Laptop   | 1024px | 12      | Tablets landscape, laptops |
| Desktop  | 1440px | 12      | Desktop monitors           |
| Wide     | 1920px | 12      | Large monitors             |

---

---

## Naming Conventions

### Pages

- `page-name.fig` (Figma)
- Use kebab-case
- Include device suffix: `checkout-mobile`, `checkout-desktop`

### Frames/Artboards

- `[Page] / [Section] / [State]`
- Example: `Checkout / Payment / Error`

### Components

- `[Category] / [Component] / [Variant] / [State]`
- Example: `Button / Primary / Large / Hover`

---

## Handoff Checklist

Before handing off to development:

- [ ] All states shown (default, hover, active, disabled, error)
- [ ] Responsive versions for all breakpoints
- [ ] Spacing annotated using design tokens
- [ ] Typography styles specified
- [ ] Colors use design system tokens
- [ ] Interactive elements annotated
- [ ] Edge cases documented (empty, loading, error)
- [ ] Accessibility notes included
